title: Vestfrost - AC Vaccine Refrigerators & Combi
author: Dotpeople Dk
cleaned_text: from +2°C to +8°C for safe and proper storage of vaccines. The series of reliable units are made for extreme conditions and tested to perform in climates with ambient temperatures up to 43°C. The Grade A classification is for products where the vital vaccines can be stored without ANY risk of freezing - regardless of how the vaccine is stored in the compartment.
